code:
sequenceDiagram
    actor User
    participant UI as UserProfileScreen
    participant PService as PostService
    participant UService as UserService
    participant DB as Supabase DB

    User->>UI: 특정 유저 닉네임 클릭 (또는 마이페이지)
    activate UI

    par 게시글 목록 조회
        UI->>PService: listPostsByUser(targetUserId)
        PService->>DB: SELECT * FROM posts WHERE author_id=...
        DB-->>PService: Post Rows
        PService-->>UI: Post[]
    and 사용자 통계 조회
        UI->>UService: getUserStats(targetUserId)
        UService->>DB: SELECT like_count, dislike_count FROM posts...
        DB-->>UService: Rows
        UService->>UService: 합계 계산 (Total Likes/Dislikes)
        UService-->>UI: { postCount, totalLikes, totalDislikes }
    end

    UI-->>User: 유저 정보, 통계, 작성 글 목록 표시
    deactivate UI
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
